common.appDescription: Analyze GitHub repository contributor activity and metrics

auth.welcomeDescription: Sign in with your GitHub account to analyze repository contributor activity and gain insights into development patterns.
auth.helpText: This application uses secure GitHub OAuth to access repository data. We only request read access to public repositories.
auth.redirectNotice: You will be redirected to the dashboard after signing in.

envToken.title: Development Mode:
envToken.description: You are using environment variable authentication for local development.

AccessDenied.title: Authorization Cancelled
AccessDenied.message: You cancelled the GitHub authorization process. No worries - you can try again whenever you're ready.

OAuthSignin.title: Sign-In Failed
OAuthSignin.message: Failed to initiate GitHub sign-in. This might be a temporary issue. Please try again.

OAuthCallback.title: Callback Error
OAuthCallback.message: An error occurred while processing the GitHub OAuth callback. Please try signing in again.

OAuthAccountNotLinked.title: Account Not Linked
OAuthAccountNotLinked.message: This GitHub account is not linked to any existing user. Please contact support or try a different account.

RefreshAccessTokenError.title: Session Expired
RefreshAccessTokenError.message: Your session has expired. Please sign in again to continue.

default.title: Authentication Error
default.message: An unexpected error occurred during authentication. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

hero.title: Team Insights
hero.subtitle: Analyze GitHub repository contributor activity and metrics to understand your team's development patterns

repository.title: Repository Analysis
repository.description: Deep dive into repository activity with commit history, pull requests, and code review metrics

contributor.title: Contributor Insights
contributor.description: Track individual contributor metrics including commits, PRs, reviews, and code changes

analytics.title: Visual Analytics
analytics.description: Interactive charts and visualizations to understand development patterns and team dynamics

security.title: Secure OAuth
security.description: Safe and secure GitHub OAuth integration with read-only access to your repositories

step1.title: Sign In with GitHub
step1.description: Authenticate securely using your GitHub account to grant read access to repositories

step2.title: Enter Repository URL
step2.description: Provide the GitHub repository URL you want to analyze

step3.title: View Detailed Insights
step3.description: Get comprehensive analytics about contributors, commits, pull requests, and reviews

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Sign in with your GitHub account to start analyzing repositories

tabs.changesComingSoon: PR Changes Timeseries tab coming soon...

permissionGuidance.title: This error usually indicates missing repository permissions. To resolve:
permissionGuidance.step1: Make sure the repository exists and is accessible
permissionGuidance.step2: If it's a private repository, ensure your GitHub account has access
permissionGuidance.step3: Try signing out and signing in again to refresh permissions
permissionGuidance.step4: Check if the repository URL is correct

form.title: Repository Analysis
form.repositoryUrlHelp: Enter the full GitHub repository URL (e.g., https://github.com/owner/repo)
form.dateRangeHelp: Leave dates empty to analyze the last 6 months

validation.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid GitHub repository URL
validation.invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date
validation.DATE_RANGE_INVALID: End date must be after start date
validation.LARGE_DATE_RANGE: Large date range may result in longer analysis time
validation.VERY_LARGE_DATE_RANGE: Very large date range (over 2 years) may take significantly longer to analyze

contributors.title: Top Contributors
contributors.description: Ranked by overall activity score (commits, PRs, reviews, and code changes)

identityMerger.title: Merge Duplicate Contributors
identityMerger.description: Select contributors that represent the same person. Choose one as the primary identity to preserve.

instructions.title: How to merge:
instructions.step1: Check the boxes for contributors to merge
instructions.step2: Click "Set as Primary" on the identity you want to keep
instructions.step3: Review the preview and click "Merge Identities"

preview.title: Merge Preview
preview.selectPrimaryPrompt: Please select a primary identity by clicking "Set as Primary" on one of the selected contributors.

prThroughput.title: PR Throughput Analysis
prThroughput.description: Relationship between PR size and merge time
prThroughput.emptyState: No merged PRs available for throughput analysis

sizeBucketAnalysis.title: PR Size Category Analysis
sizeBucketAnalysis.description: Compare lead times across different PR size categories

message.optimal: {bucketName} PRs merge fastest on average. Consider breaking larger changes into smaller pull requests.
message.noDifference: PR size has minimal impact on lead time. All size categories show similar merge speeds.
message.insufficientData: Not enough data to determine optimal PR size. Analyze at least 10 merged PRs for meaningful insights.

prTimeseries.title: PR Changes Timeseries
prTimeseries.description: Weekly code change trends and patterns
prTimeseries.emptyState: No merged PRs available for timeseries analysis

outliers.title: Outlier Weeks Detected
outliers.description: Weeks with abnormally high code changes (2+ standard deviations above mean)
outliers.noOutliers: No outlier weeks detected. All weeks show typical activity levels.

trend.title: 4-Week Trend
trend.insufficientData: Insufficient data for trend analysis. At least 4 weeks of PR history required.

summary.title: Summary Statistics
summary.description: Aggregate metrics across the analysis period

emptyState.title: No Deployment Data
emptyState.message: No deployment events found for this repository.

guide.title: To track deployments, you can:
guide.releases: Create GitHub Releases for your versions
guide.tags: Tag your commits with semantic versioning (v1.0.0)
guide.actions: Set up GitHub Actions to create Deployment events

phase3.complete: Phase 3 Complete: Server Component → Client Component data flow active

phase4.active: Phase 4 Active: Background historical data loading with useTransition

features.backgroundLoading: Background historical data loading with useTransition
features.nonBlockingUpdates: Non-blocking UI updates during background loading

commits.title: Commits ({count})
commits.notYetDisplayed: Commit data loaded but not yet displayed

errors.TOKEN_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
errors.INVALID_URL: Invalid repository URL. Please check and try again.
errors.INVALID_TOKEN: Invalid authentication token. Please sign in again.
errors.REPO_NOT_FOUND: Repository not found. Please check the URL.
errors.INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS: Insufficient permissions to access this repository.
errors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: GitHub API rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.CLONE_FAILED: Failed to clone repository. Please try again.
errors.ANALYSIS_TIMEOUT: Analysis timed out. This might be a very large repository.
errors.INTERNAL_ERROR: An internal error occurred. Please try again.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: Team Insights ("we", "our", or "us") operates https://team-insights-rouge.vercel.app (the "Service"). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our Service.

informationCollection.title: Information Collection and Use
informationCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information:

github.title: GitHub Account Information
github.content: When you sign in with GitHub OAuth, we collect your GitHub username, email, and profile information. This information is used solely for authentication and service provision.

repository.title: Repository Data
repository.content: You provide GitHub repository URLs for analysis. We access repository data through GitHub's API using your authenticated session. Repository data is processed in real-time and not permanently stored.

oauth.title: OAuth Tokens
oauth.content: GitHub OAuth access tokens are encrypted and stored server-side in encrypted JWT session cookies. These tokens are used exclusively for accessing GitHub API on your behalf to perform repository analysis.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: To authenticate you and provide access to the Service
To analyze GitHub repository activity as requested by you
To improve and optimize the Service
To communicate with you about the Service

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use encrypted session cookies to maintain your authentication state. In the future, we plan to implement Google AdSense, which may use cookies for advertising purposes. You will be notified of any such changes to this policy.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information. OAuth tokens are encrypted server-side, and all data transmission occurs over HTTPS. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Session data is retained only for the duration of your authenticated session. Repository analysis results are not permanently stored. When you sign out, your session data is deleted.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our Service uses GitHub OAuth for authentication and GitHub API for repository data access. Please review GitHub's Privacy Policy to understand how they handle your data.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can sign out at any time to end your session and delete session data. For other requests, please contact us through GitHub Issues.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Team Insights (the "Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Team Insights is a GitHub repository development activity analysis tool. The Service allows you to analyze contributor activity, commits, pull requests, and code review metrics for GitHub repositories.

accountRequirements.title: 3. Account and Authentication
accountRequirements.content: To use the Service, you must authenticate using a valid GitHub account. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your GitHub account and for all activities that occur under your account.

acceptableUse.title: 4. Acceptable Use
items: Use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Service or related systems
Make excessive requests to the Service that could impair performance
Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Service
Use the Service to violate GitHub's Terms of Service
Share your authentication credentials with others
Use automated tools to scrape or download data from the Service

intellectualProperty.title: 5. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Team Insights and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

disclaimers.title: 6. Disclaimers
disclaimers.intro: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:
items: Accuracy and completeness of analysis results
Availability of GitHub API or third-party services
disclaimers.note: Analysis results are provided for informational purposes only and should not be relied upon as the sole basis for important decisions.

limitations.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitations.content: IN NO EVENT SHALL TEAM INSIGHTS BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE. OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID TO USE THE SERVICE (CURRENTLY $0).

serviceInterruptions.title: 8. Service Interruptions
serviceInterruptions.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the Service at any time without notice. We are not liable for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the Service.

dataAndPrivacy.title: 9. Data and Privacy
dataAndPrivacy.content: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy. By using the Service, you consent to the collection and use of information as described in our Privacy Policy.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to the Service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

governingLaw.title: 11. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Japan, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of material changes by posting the updated Terms on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through
